description.lang: TheNanoMote Quadis a wireless, portable and rechargeable scene switch. It can control a Z-Wave device, such as smart plug, smart dimmer with a Z-Wave gateway. You can also activate a scene like sleep scene, movie scene and entertainment scene with it.
NanoMote Quad will send the central scene notification command and battery report command to the associated nodes if any button is triggered.
NanoMote Quad will send Basic Set command to the associated nodes if button 1 is pressed.

NanoMote Quad will sendswitch multilevel set, the multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command to the associated nodes if button 1 is pressed, hold and released, respectively.
Scene Controller will send Basic Set command to the associated nodes if button 2 is pressed.

NanoMote Quad will sendswitch multilevel set, the multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command to the associated nodes if button 2 is pressed, hold and released, respectively.
NanoMote Quad will send Basic Set command to the associated nodes if button 3 is pressed.

NanoMote Quad will sendswitch multilevel set, the multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command to the associated nodes if button 3 is pressed, hold and released, respectively.
NanoMote Quad will send Basic Set command to the associated nodes if button 4 is pressed.

NanoMote Quad will sendswitch multilevel set, the multilevel start level change and multilevel stop level change command to the associated nodes if button 4 is pressed, hold and released, respectively.
Define a battery level as the low battery.
when the value is 10% to 50%,it will send a low battery command.
set of sending central scene notification or not
when value is 0, it can not be send scene notification;when the value is 1,it can be send central scene notification.

name.lang: Setting the duration value of the command switch multilevel.

description.lang: Setting the duration value of the command switch multilevel.
the higher the value,the long the duration value of the command switch multilevel

name.lang: Enable/disable the buzzer alarm when battery is running low.

description.lang: set the buzzer alarm or not when battery is low
when the value is 0,the product will not allow the buzzer alarm when battery is running low;when the value is 1,the product will allow the buzzer alarm when battery is running low
